description:
An older woman, she is a doctor for both humans and androids. She was involved in the creation of the A7 series of robots, and hosted http://anidb.net/ch11306 [Director Alpha] in her home, possibly as Director Alpha`s owner. When she was younger, she rode motorcycles and raced hovercraft, and was http://anidb.net/ch11308 [old man]`s senior from school. Her surname is Koumi`ishi (子海石, lit. "child-sea-stone"), but she is always addressed by just her title.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Sensei
